target: Okay. I have a reservation for 4 for two nights starting Friday.
context: <user> I will be visiting family in the south part of cambridge and we would liek to get one last boating excursion in. Any boating places in the south area? <system> It looks like there isn't any boating in the south area. Would you like me to look in a different area of town? <user> How about a nightclub in the south? <system> Sure, The Place is on 22 sidney street and the postcode is cb23hg. Phone number is 01223324600. <user> Thank you for all your help. <system> Is there anything else I can help you with? <user> i would like place to stay. The hotel should be in the type of guesthouse and should include free wifi <system> aylesbray lodge guest house is a nice four star guesthose with internet available. Would you like me to book you a room?<user> I would prefer a guest house that has one star. Is there one available also with free wifi? <system> No, I'm sorry there are no 1 start guesthouses offering free wifi. Is there anything else I can help you with?<user> Okay, the four will be fine, then. I dont need to book, yet. Thanks for your help. <system> No problem. Are you sure you don't want to go ahead and make a reservation?<user> Can you book it for 4 people for 2 nights starting friday? <system>
